Package org.bouncycastle.openpgp.bc

BC light weight based OpenPGP objects.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BcPGPObjectFactory
    PGPObjectFactory that uses the Bouncy Castle lightweight API to implement cryptographic primitives.

    BcPGPPublicKeyRingCollection

Package org.bouncycastle.openpgp.bc Description

BC light weight based OpenPGP objects.

Some high-level OpenPGP classes require access to cryptographic algorithms. The classes in this package provide extensions using the BC light weight API.
